timeline.message: Expose "writeFields" from JsonWriter, to write only document fields
Take 2 of async /document/v1 handler — handler only
Tests, more config and various fixes
Remove unneeded threading in unit test
Default to a single wanted document in visits
Be stricter about request property parsing (and test this)
Use UPDATE when doing an update

timeline.bodyText: enqueued might be positive even when the actual queue is empty (when multiple threads executes enqueueAndDispatch simultaneously.
timeline.author: bjorncs

timeline.bodyText: We will probably want to control resender threads from ContainerThreadpool later on.
timeline.author: bjorncs
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,15 +1,15 @@
 # Copyright Verizon Media. Licensed under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license. See LICENSE in the project root.
 package=com.yahoo.document.restapi
 
-# Delay before a throttled operation is retried.
-resendDelayMillis     int default=100
-
-# Time between a document operation is received and a timeout response is sent
-defaultTimeoutSeconds int default=180
-
-# Time after which a visitor session times out
-visitTimeoutSeconds   int default=120
+# Duration for which resender thread sleeps after an operation is throttled
+resendDelayMillis     int default=10
 
 # Bound on number of document operations to keep in retry queue — further operations are rejected
 maxThrottled          int default=1000
 
+# Whether to perform dispatch from Jetty threads
+doDispatchWithEnqueue bool default=true
+
+# Number of workers in the resender thread pool
+resenderCount         int default=1

replies.bodyText: Yes, this isn't even used now >_< Let's clean up when we decide on how we do it.
replies.author: jonmv
